parameters.param:
AUTHOR=$(git log --oneline --pretty="%ae"|head -1) echo commit author is $AUTHOR CURRENT_BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) CURRENT_BRANCH_TYPE=$(echo $CURRENT_BRANCH|cut -d/ -f1) case "${CURRENT_BRANCH_TYPE}" in "feature" ) TARGET_BRANCH="develop" ;; *) echo "ERROR: Invalid branch type" exit 1 ;; esac
echo "source branch: $CURRENT_BRANCH" echo "target branch: $TARGET_BRANCH"
echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='git.branch.source' value='refs/heads/${CURRENT_BRANCH}']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='git.branch.target' value='refs/heads/${TARGET_BRANCH}']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='COMMIT.author' value='${AUTHOR}']"
